425 #define HIGH_BYTE(x) ((uint8_t)(((x)&0xFF00)>>8))

449 typedef enum
450 {
451  ble_addr_type_public = 0,
452  ble_addr_type_random_static = 1,
453  ble_addr_type_random_resolvable = 2,
454  ble_addr_type_random_non_resolvable = 3,
455 }__attribute__((packed)) ble_addr_type;
456 
460 typedef struct
461 {
462  ble_addr_type addr_type;
463  uint8_t addr[BLE_ADDR_LEN];
464 } __attribute__((packed)) ble_addr_t;
465 
470 typedef enum
471 {
472  ble_ad_type_ind = 0x00,
473  ble_ad_type_direct_ind = 0x01,
474  ble_ad_type_scan_ind = 0x02,
475  ble_ad_type_nonconn_ind = 0x03,
476  ble_ad_type_direct_ind_low = 0x04,
477 }__attribute__((packed)) ble_ad_type;
478 
483 typedef enum
484 {
485  ble_scan_type_passive = 0x00,
486  ble_scan_type_active = 0x01
487 }__attribute__((packed))ble_scan_type;
488

498  ble_report_type_scan_ind = 0x02,
499  ble_report_type_nonconn_ind = 0x03,
500  ble_report_type_scan_rsp = 0x04
501 }__attribute__((packed)) ble_report_type;

507 typedef enum
508 {
509  ble_filter_any = 0x00,
510  ble_filter_filter_scan = 0x01,
511  ble_filter_filter_conn = 0x02,
512  ble_filter_filter_both = 0x03
513 }__attribute__((packed)) ble_filter_policy_t;
514

526  ble_scan_policy_3 = 0x03
531 }__attribute__((packed))ble_scan_policy_t;

541 typedef struct

545 } ble_gap_whitelist_t;

550 typedef struct
551 {
552  ble_ad_type ad_type;
553  ble_addr_t *peer_addr;
554  ble_addr_type self_addr_type;
555  ble_filter_policy_t filter;
556  uint16_t min_interval;
557  uint16_t max_interval;
558  uint8_t channel_mask;
559 }__attribute__((packed)) ble_gap_adv_params;

568  uint16_t window;
569  ble_addr_type owner;

571  ble_gap_whitelist_t * p_whitelist;
572  bool filter_duplicated;
573 } __attribute__((packed)) ble_gap_scan_params_t;

696 typedef struct
697 {
698  union
699  {
700  ble_gap_evt_connected_t connected;
701  ble_gap_evt_disconnected_t disconnected;
702  ble_gap_evt_conn_param_update_t conn_param_update;
703  ble_gap_evt_adv_report_t adv_report;

705  ble_gap_evt_operation_fail_t operation_fail;
706  ble_gap_evt_remote_version_t remote_version;
707  } __attribute__((packed)) params;
708 } __attribute__((packed)) ble_gap_evt_t;
